name: Starship Clicker (itch)
description:
NOTICE:

Currently, clicking on the graphics quality dropdown will crash the Unity WebGL player. I'm not sure why, but I am looking into it. For now, just don't use it!

Synopsis:

The United Galactic Federation needs new Star ships! Get to work producing star ships for the federation by clicking on the 3D spaceship button! Hire astronauts, commission robots, and deploy factories to get the federation the ships they need! Power-ups (i.e. astronauts, robots, and factories) cost star ships, the price indicated to the left of the corresponding icon on the right side of the screen. In the top center of the screen resides the total number of star ships that you have produced! On the left side of the screen is your stats display, here you can retrieve info about how many power-ups you own. The rotating ship in the center is what you click to build. The more power-ups you have the faster you can build! If you need to adjust the game quality, sound, or want to switch to full screen there is a gear icon in the top right of the screen. Click that gear icon to open up the options menu.
